result.arabic_text: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ
result.translation: Uyo yahomvye mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, araheza agasenga mu gishingo c’Imana Allah ikintu ata co kimwicira mu gihe yoreka kugisenga, eka ata n’ico kimumarira mu gihe yogisenga. Ukwo rero, ni kwo guhuba kuri kure cane y’ukuri;
